title: Add Teachers & Class Notes Section with Tabbed Navigation

requirements.summary: Create TeachersNotes component with bilingual section title and subtitle

Subtitle text is displayed below the title

file_operations.description: Create the TeachersNotes component with section title 'Teachers & Class Notes' and subtitle 'Access class-wise notes prepared by our expert teachers to strengthen learning and excel in exams'. Use the LanguageContext for bilingual support with English and Bengali translations. Structure the component to include the title, subtitle, and a container for tabbed content that will be implemented in subsequent requirements.

requirements.summary: Style notes cards with grid layout and hover effects
acceptanceCriteria: Cards are displayed in a responsive grid layout
Each card includes all specified elements: avatar, name, class, subject, experience, features, button
Hover effect lifts card with shadow animation
Grid adapts to different screen sizes

file_operations.description: Apply grid layout styling to the notes cards using Tailwind CSS classes (e.g., grid, grid-cols-1, md:grid-cols-2, lg:grid-cols-3). Structure each card to include teacher avatar image, name, class range, subject, experience, features list, and download button. Implement hover effects using Tailwind (hover:scale-105, hover:shadow-xl, transition-transform) to lift cards slightly with shadow animation. Ensure the grid is responsive and adapts to mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports. Match the existing site theme with gold/yellow accents and dark background with maroon accents.

requirements.summary: Implement responsive mobile design for cards and tabs
acceptanceCriteria: Cards stack vertically on mobile viewports
Tabs remain accessible on mobile through scrolling or stacking
All content is readable and interactive on small screens
Touch targets are appropriately sized for mobile

file_operations.description: Enhance responsive design for mobile devices. Ensure cards stack vertically on small screens using Tailwind responsive classes (grid-cols-1 on mobile, md:grid-cols-2 on tablet, lg:grid-cols-3 on desktop). Make tabs horizontally scrollable on mobile using overflow-x-auto and whitespace-nowrap, or implement vertical stacking if preferred. Ensure touch targets for tabs and buttons are at least 44x44px for accessibility. Test that all text is readable and interactive elements are easily tappable on mobile viewports.

file_operations.description: Import and render the TeachersNotes component in App.tsx. Position it after the existing Teachers section and before the Gallery section. Ensure the component follows the same section pattern as other components (e.g., proper padding, margin, and container classes). Maintain consistent styling with the existing design theme including gold/yellow text, dark background, and maroon accents. Verify the component flow is seamless with proper spacing between sections.

Add Bengali translations for: section title 'Teachers & Class Notes', subtitle, all three tab labels ('LKG ‚Äì Class 3', 'Class 4 ‚Äì 10', 'Class 4 ‚Äì 12'), teacher names (Sonali Ma'am, Abhijit (Abhi) Da, Santanu Sir), subjects, experience labels, all notes features descriptions, and button text.
